metadata.title: Locoface - Turn Your Photo Into Cute Stickers
metadata.description: Transform any selfie into adorable chibi kawaii stickers with AI. Create unique stickers for WhatsApp, iMessage, and more in seconds!
metadata.keywords: sticker maker, AI stickers, chibi stickers, kawaii, photo to sticker, WhatsApp stickers, custom stickers

hero.headline: Turn Your Face Into
hero.subheadline: AI-powered chibi stickers in seconds. No account needed.
hero.subheadline_christmas: Create festive chibi stickers with Santa hats!

fun_messages.1: Each sticker is 100% unique to you!

instant.title: Instant delivery
instant.description: No waiting - it's ready for you!

sharing.title: Perfect for sharing
sharing.description: A magical gift for friends & family
